MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL19 postcode area of Prestatyn affecting properties in Victoria Road West, Oldgate Road and the surrounding area. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:14AM on 31st March 2021
